func.title: SetPlrKnowledge

param.name: player
param.desc: Player which receives or loses the construction plan. If nil, the function is executed for all players.

param.name: definition
param.desc: Id of the definition for which the plan shall be given.

param.name: remove
param.desc: If not false, the plan will be removed from the players knowledge.

func.desc: Gives a player a construction plan resp. removes the plan if remove is given.

example.code: var i, id; while (id = GetDefinition(i++)) SetPlrKnowledge(nil, id);
example.text: All players are given plans to all loaded objects.
